General.Description: BLOCKv is a shared protocol. It allows the creation of digital objects (vAtoms) on different blockchains such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, and EON. vAtoms provides the owner with all the advantages of cryptocurrency, such as scarcity, ownership, and merchantability, but also in the form of collectibles, coupons, loyalty programs, gift cards, games and more, allowing users to own a virtual object just like you own a physical object. V-Code (VEE) is an authorization-level ERC20 for all operations in the BLOCKv platform.
